snippet.title: Martha Is Dead | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Martha Is Dead is a first-person psychological thriller, set in 1944 Italy, launching on PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and the Xbox family of devices on 24th February 2022 - developed by LKA. 

Uncover a dark multi-layered narrative which blurs the lines between reality, superstition, and the tragedy of war, explore a stunning recreation of the Italian countryside, and take photographs as you look for clues to discover the truth about what happened to Martha! 

Check out the creepy new teaser, made using Unreal Engine's revolutionary ‘MetaHuman’ technology. 

A physical version of Martha Is Dead is now available to pre-order on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5. Find a retailer via Wired’s Where to Buy section. 
https://wiredproductions.com/games/martha-is-dead/

Wishlist now on Steam: https://bit.ly/3ACJdsS
Wishlist now on GOG: https://bit.ly/39wp63G
Wishlist now on Epic Games Store: https://bit.ly/3p8R7pF

#MarthaIsDead

🟥⬛⬛⬛🟥⬛⬛⬛⬛🟥⬛⬛⬛⬛⬛🟥
